location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.134 of 1857 from Henry Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to Commander Felix Jones, Political Agent with the Persian Expeditionary Force

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of receipt of Jones’s earlier letter (folio 121) relating to reports of Wahabee [Wahhābī] movements towards Oman, with the request that Jones do everything in his power to ensure tranquility in the region.
